argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | deg1addle.y | |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | deg1addle.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | deg1addle.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | deg1addle.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 5 |  | deg1addle.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` Y ) |
| 6 |  | deg1addle.f | |- ( ph -> F e. B ) |
| 7 |  | deg1addle.g | |- ( ph -> G e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_deg1fval | |- D = ( 1o mDeg R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) = ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 8, 5 | #P_ply1plusg | |- .+ = ( +g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 4 | #P_ply1bascl2 | |- ( F e. B -> F e. ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F e. ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 4 | #P_ply1bascl2 | |- ( G e. B -> G e. ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) ) |
| 17 | 7, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 9, 11, 3, 12, 13, 15, 17 | #P_mdegaddle | |- ( ph -> ( D ` ( F .+ G ) ) <_ if ( ( D ` F ) <_ ( D ` G ) , ( D ` G ) , ( D ` F ) ) ) |
